thread.section_title: Thinking Capital Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thinking Capital | thinkingcapital.ca
thread.title: Sue Anderson
thread.title_full: Thinking Capital reviewed by Sue Anderson

author: Sue Anderson
title: Sue Anderson
text:
I am a small business owner. I highly recommend Thinking Capital to anyone who needs funds to grow their business or who needs help with cash flow issues. A big thank you to Jason Segal who is extremely efficient and professional. Jason took the time to understand my business and to come up with a affordable solution. Look no further, Thinking Capital team has it all!
Sue Anderson
Small Business Owner
